attributes.action: stop the influx of migrants to do work that british people can do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the USA people are refused visas to work if the same job could be done by an American citizen the same needs to happen here there are 7 million people not working in this country but migrants are turning up everyday taking jobs that could be done by uk citizens this leads to all the extra pressure on the economy hospitals schools transport etc its time to put a stop to it before its to late

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigration
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
